values: Please tell me your Name followed by Date Of Birth and Annual Income
Your $frequency premium for $term under the $protection_type plan is Rs67767. \nDo you want to try any other options or go ahead with buying this?
You are most welcome. Please let me know if I can further assist you.

Income Protection Insurance (IPI) is an insurance policy, available principally in Australia, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, and the United Kingdom, paying benefits to policyholders who are incapacitated and hence unable to work due to illness or accident.

Fixed income refers to any type of investment under which the borrower or issuer is obliged to make payments of a fixed amount on a fixed schedule. For example, the borrower may have to pay interest at a fixed rate once a year, and to repay the principal amount on maturity.
On death during the Policy term, Sum Assured as a lump sum is paid to the nominee and the policy terminates.

Term life insurance or term assurance is life insurance that provides coverage at a fixed rate of payments for a limited period of time, the relevant term. After that period expires, coverage at the previous rate of premiums is no longer guaranteed and the client must either forgo coverage or potentially obtain further coverage with different payments or conditions.

You have come to the right place We offer you a smart, affordable and convenient way to safeguard the future for you and your family. Can I ask you a couple of questions to come up with the best plan for you?
